website_summaries.verdict: Not as versatile as other models we tested, but it's a solid choice if you are looking for a powerful tool.
pros: Incorporates features such as a 95-inch cord, powerful motor, and ergonomic handle for precise results
cons: It's not recommended for use on delicate fabrics

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! I had to laugh though when I got ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I had to laugh though when I got it. The box says...well, read the pic yourself. It's hilarious!! Definitely not written by someone with a command of English!! However, I LOVE that I can plug it in. No more looking for batteries to get full power. I used it on 2 sweaters yesterday and it breezed right over them in just a few minutes and one was really linty from washing with a new towel. Now see the photo and have a good laugh. Just remember, you can keep the noodles!! I couldn't get the photo upright - Amazon pay attention. We need to be able to rotate photos.
customer_reviews.author: #EAHWP

customer_reviews.title: Great for sofa.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my sofa and it worked great. The fabric was all pilly and this cleaned it right up. I like that it plugs in so I don't have to worry about batteries. See before and after photos.
customer_reviews.author: jan64

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I received the item I opened it and immediately turned it on. As soon as I touched it to my sweater, it stopped working. The red light is on, but sliding the button does nothing. I'd give this piece of junk zero stars if I could. I can't return it because it says it isn't refund eligible. Update 5/10/2017: I was contacted by email from the seller. They rushed me a new shavers and apologized about sending me a defective product. I used the new shavers as soon as I got it for about 20 mins on a few clothing items and my king size mattress. I am happy to say the new shavers works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Keondra B

customer_reviews.title: Great for 15 minutes then died forever
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 15 minutes. "Not returnable"? Took all the lint off my sweater I cleaned it out and followed the directions and went to use it on something else; it stopped working and never worked again. When I tried to return it it says "item not returnable."
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chewed a hole in my $40 hoodie!
customer_reviews.text: Buy something else! Noisy, cheaply made, doesn't work well and can't turn it on or off with only one hand since the button is so stiff and awkwardly positioned. It chewed a huge hole in my favorite $40 Carhardt hoodie and I'm LIVID! I barely pressed down on it while on a flat iron board and it totally sucked the fabric in. I'm attaching a photo as proof!
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Tried this on a pair of slacks that had a lot of pilling towards the top where they come into contact with my shirts. See attached pic, it worked great! The "before"is on the left and the "after"is in the right. Deducted one star because I tried it on a thin sweater and it snagged and made a tiny hole. Would work great on regular sweaters, but definitely avoid using this on delicate fabrics.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Shave your sweater!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my significant other and she loves it. It allows her to keep the fuzzballs off her sweaters and other garments without damaging them and without the tedium of other methods. So far it hasn't had any issues or damaged anything at all though she uses it infrequently and only on certain things. Obviously, if you use it often on the same item it's eventually going to wear that item it because it is removing material that has pilled on the garment's surface so be aware of what you're doing with it. Overall, it's a decent product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Get the super-glue
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 1 shirt, then didn't remove anything. After looking at it, I noticed the blades no longer touched the foil head. Seems the motor shaft is too short and blades back away from the foil head after normal use. I put a drop of superglue to hold the blades at the correct distance. It works OK now, but this is not designed right, the motor shaft needs to be about 1/8" longer. Mike
customer_reviews.author: Mr Fauteux

customer_reviews.title: It worked fine on a test item
customer_reviews.text: I took the product out when it arrived to make sure it worked. It worked fine on a test item. When I pulled it back to use it, about a month after purchase, I plugged it in and it did not come one (only the second time it was plugged in and used). I jiggled the cord a little and then the red light came on, but there was also a big fire spark inside the body of the item. I immediately unplugged the item in fear that it might start a fire. Please make sure that your item is not defective and does not cause a fire or blow out of your socket.
customer_reviews.author: J Wil

customer_reviews.title: Creates holes in your clothes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this twice and both times it has left holes in my clothing. I just threw it in the garbage after it put 2 holes in a brand new shirt that I wore for the first time today.
customer_reviews.author: wdee

customer_reviews.title: Best gadget
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing.. it does not require batteries and it does the job.. love it for all of my sweaters that aquire material balls all over them. I had a sweater I was going to throw away but this product saved it from the trash and brought it back to life!!
customer_reviews.author: jenene

customer_reviews.title: Best investment yet!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! My mom had one of these when she was growing up but hers was battery operated. The battery operated one just didn't seem to work at a constant flow so I feel like I needed to try a corded one. Best investment yet! I have recommended it to all of my friends so far. Tried it on my couch and pillows and it worked like magic!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Suazo

customer_reviews.title: Product and Customer Service = Five Stars!
customer_reviews.text: Recently, while emptying the lint from the lint bin, the bin slipped from my hand resulting in a piece breaking off, which prevented it from snapping into place. I was devastated that it broke because I absolutely love this shaver --it has a long cord, maintains its power, and the blades are long lasting. So, I decided to contact the manufacture to inquire about purchasing a replacement bin. They told me that they do not sell the bins separately but offered to send me a whole new lint shaver free of charge! As promised, they delivered and I received my new lint catcher on yesterday. Thank you Anwenk, for your great customer service and product!
customer_reviews.author: Beckhart

customer_reviews.title: Not Returnable!
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from this De-Fuzzer unless you want an item that isn't returnable, easily takes up to an hour per item and requires elbow grease to de-fuzz one item of clothing. If you're expecting swift removal of clothing pills with this model expect much less. Just went to my orders to print out a return label and surprise, this item is not returnable!
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Robbery!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on a pair of leggings and a pair of panties for about 15 minutes then it broke and you can not return it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Bardsley

customer_reviews.title: The item I purchased will not run.
customer_reviews.text: I had to separately purchase a USB device to run the damn thing and then it would not work. The shaving blade started to run and then stopped and the shaver died. Now I am having big trouble to return it for a refund because AMAZON does not accept the return of this item. What to do? Give me an address to ship it to, to get my refund. ingebeckham@outlook.com
customer_reviews.author: Inge B

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on the sofa.
customer_reviews.text: So far I am really liking this lint shaver. I got this to use on my fabric couch that was starting to pill. It takes a little time and patience to go over an area and thoroughly get everything but the end result is well worth it. The power cord means you wont be losing power because of dying batteries and the lint chamber is large enough to hold a lot of stuff. This is not one of those small appliance you use everyday, but the overall quality and ease of use, seem like it will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Yarrow10

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS WORTH IT'S WEIGHT IN GOLD!
customer_reviews.text: I WAS HOPING TO FIND A WAY TO GET THE FUZZ BALLS OFF OF FURNITURE COVERS ANYTHING WITH SWEATSHIRT MATERIAL, USED ON LINED LEGGINGS. IT'S FABULOUS. I LOVE THE ELECTRIC AND CORD PROVIDES AMPLE ROOM TO WORK WITH. I SEE THEY HAVE A NOTE THEY DO NOT KNOW WHETHER THEY WILL GET THIS BACK. YOU DON'T KNOW HOW MANY TIMES I THOUGHT OF ORDERING AN ANOTHER. THIS IS AN EAZY THING TO USE AND IT WORKS
customer_reviews.author: MAGICARPET

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This item doesn't deserve any stars. I purchased two and one of shavers doesn't even work - defective right out of the box! What a waste of money! The plug appears to be a hazard - it slides right out of the socket.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The motor died during first use.
customer_reviews.text: The day I received the product, I used it on a pair of pants. Before I was done treating the entire pair of pants, the motor just died. The light on the device still comes on, but the button no longer engages the actual motor to work. The return policy is a non return policy, so now I am stuck with the order and the device is not working. I would not recommend to order this product. I feel like I have no recourse now and wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I've always been curious if a defuzzer even existed in this world and was THRILLED when my co worker told me they do! She has the one that is a chargeable one and recommended a plug in because it dies quickly. I quickly purchased this and am SO happy with my purchase! I highly recommend the plug in. In regards to performance... it performance very well and has gotten rid of all the fuzzy balls on my yoga pants, jackets, sweaters, and dresses!
customer_reviews.author: LizzieLiz

customer_reviews.title: BEST of 5 Brands purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Having purchased 5 different brands of Fabric Shavers (4 made in China), THIS ONE WAS BEST OF FIVE different manufacturers! Thank goodness, 1 item from Taiwan worked and worked well~ *swoon Although, I often had to unscrew the shaving head to blow out fluff and pilling for cleaning, it's easy to accomplish.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Stein

customer_reviews.title: A MUST have for CLOTHING that PILLS
customer_reviews.text: If you have clothes you need this! I have been meaning to order one of these but didn't like battery operated as they were not powerful enough. So when my brand new worn only twice top starting to pill I of course went to Amazon & found what I needed. Works wonderful and makes sweaters and any article of clothing that pills look like new. So happy with how this works!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Green

customer_reviews.title: Works better than smaller fabric shaver, but...
customer_reviews.text: PROs 1) I read the reviews about not using on thinner material. 2) Better results than both my battery operated fabric shavers CONS!!! I used it once and now it does work. It physically turns on. But doesnt remove 1 pile from a sweater. It sounds quieter when trying to use it for a second time. Even though there arent many parts, a simple piece of paper for instructions would be GREAT!!! I am extremely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Spear

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the machine
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the machine, don't have to worry running out of juice, and the cord is plenty long to reach from most outlets in the room to do the job. Awesome company to buy from looks and feels like quality built. had a small issue with it and the company replied an got it figured out super quick overall highly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Does Great On Smaller Lent
customer_reviews.text: First Off No Instruction Were Included. Doesn't Do Great With Thick Lent The Smaller The Lent The Easier To Remove It Does Great Then. Make Sure To Empty The Lent As You Go. It Is Powered By USB For Elctrical Power, Batteries Would Die Quick. You Can Hold It In Your hand Or Lay It Flat On Hard Surface.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Banks

customer_reviews.title: Do not Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever! Original order was missing the part that holds the lint. Couldn't return it but was given a credit to but another one which I did. It worked only twice. I even tried to use the original one I ordered and that no longer worked either. Biggest waste my money.
customer_reviews.author: kahono

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and does what it says it does. Might not want to run it too long or it will get a bit warm. The prongs are not grounded so beware of that, but it works fine for the price. Tried the battery operated one and batteries died quickly. Electric is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Rockermama

customer_reviews.title: Get lint off your black clothes!
customer_reviews.text: I first had the battery one but the electric one works WAY better! You need more power. Gets fuzzies and pilling off clothes, fabric pillow, etc. This gets lint off black clothes like a dream! I wish I had it years ago. Probably would be good for pet hair too? We are without a dog right now. But soon : ) Love it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ed or V

customer_reviews.title: It does an amazing job of removing even the smallest pills on sweaters
customer_reviews.text: This lint shaver is just what I was looking for. It does an amazing job of removing even the smallest pills on sweaters, sweatshirts, and fuzz balls that just seem to appear on fleece apparel. I love the long cord too. The shaver is easy to operate, easy to remove the shaved lint, and not too large so it is easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Gina T.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today and it doesn’t work. It will not let me return it either. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: MAGIC...You’ll want to de-pill everything! LOL
customer_reviews.text: STOP SCROLLING AND BUY THIS MIRACULOUS MACHINE LOL. No, but seriously this sucker is beyond worth it. I never ever ever write reviews. Like ever. And after I used this ALL night, I had to share. It removed thousands and thousands of fuzz balls off of my couch and pillows. They are now like new. People you NEED this. You can thank me later!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren From Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Furniture saver
customer_reviews.text: Thought we were going to have to replace our almost New sofa because the cushions looked so pilled. 5 minutes later the sofa looks good as new!
customer_reviews.author: NewParents

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a beast!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast! I had clothing I wasn't able to wear because no shaver would take off the little pills but this guy has made it possible to wear those pieces off clothing again. The only thing that is a little sketchy is the plug, it looks like a really outdated plug which makes me a little nervous when using it.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of time and money. There is no plug so It has to remain plugged in using a USB port which requires an extension cord most likely. Broke the first time I used it. Very flimsy and light weight. Plus it’s non returnable!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: which turned out to be a good decision. I used the shaver to remove lint ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one because it didn’t require batteries, which turned out to be a good decision. I used the shaver to remove lint from my linen livingroom set, which took a few hours. My couches look like new and feel so soft, which makes me happy. I haven’t used other devices before this, and was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Ela

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!!  Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a sweatshirt that was all pilled up I took this clothing shaver to it came out like brand new also have an ottoman that had the same problem that now looks brand new love this product !!! Easy to use had to empty out cup quite a few times so much lint
customer_reviews.author: Beachbaby

customer_reviews.title: a
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work and they don't accept returns. Now I know why there so many $.25 to $5.00 stores opening up ( Amazon return stores). Do not buy this product!!!!!!! And if the seller reads this SEND ME A NEW ONE that works !!! Could have given the money to a homeless person and gotten more satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tool!
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed! It does an amazing job. The only thing is the cord being short. I just use an extension cord. My kids were very thankful that their sweatpants and goodies look brand new after using this fabric shavers! I have shown family members and friends this fabric shaver. You can't beat the price too. I got the wired shaver instead of battery operated one so no costly battery replacing.
customer_reviews.author: M. Velez

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working immediately
customer_reviews.text: I opened the item. All appeared to be well. After using it for a minute, it stopped working. It now sounds like it is blowing air out like a fan. Not sure what the problem is. I tried to return the defective item and was notified that it was ineligible for a return or refund. Not a great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these shavers years ago but it was battery operated. I was excited to see that this was electric. I have made all my dress slack look new again. The pic is of sweater sleeves. I’m so excited to be able to wear it again. Makes your job go faster because it has an even speed. Definitely one of my best buys!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I used my new Anwenk Electric Sweater Shaver a couple of days after I received it, on a favorite sweater that looked like it had seen better days. I started on one side of the sweater and was amazed with the results. My old, pilly sweater looked like it did when it was new. I love, love, love it! I had a battery operated one that I used until it broke. I'm so excited that I have the electric one!! It's wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will save you hundreds making old clothes look new.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shaver. It took a piled suit dress accidentally washed and made it look brand new. It also delinted my winter coat. Only 2 uses so far but I love it. Unless it breaks with more frequent use this is an awesome product that saved me from having to replace expensive clothes so that is a win.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda G.

customer_reviews.title: AC will
customer_reviews.text: The shaver works great and is much more efficient than the battery operated ones. The cord is really long too so it gives you room to move around
customer_reviews.author: Sleepy83

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for your Bucks!
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time choosing between the battery operated one or the plug and I'm so happy that I chose this item. It works really well. Its a bit loud but it gets the job done. The cord is plenty long for you to maneuver. It collects all the lint and sucks up the pet hairs. Definitely a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Meshe

customer_reviews.title: Did not even get one use from this POS.
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in, tried to power it on nothing happened. Wiggled the cord, turned it off, then back on, bright burst of light in the base, then a smoky smell. Was never able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: stargaret

customer_reviews.title: Seems to have plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: I've only used mine 2 or 3 times. But it worked well and a bedspread and a bed sheet. I have a small battery operated one that I use on T-shirts and sweatshirts.
customer_reviews.author: FuzzmanKs

customer_reviews.title: remove the little pills or fuzzys that get on your clothing
customer_reviews.text: love this item great for keeping your clothing looking newer , so you can keep that old favorite sweater that has little those fuzzys that make it ugly this will get rid of the little fuzzys or pills on your clothing
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Romero

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Box was open when received, cleaning brush was outside the box, plugged it and it was already on. Didn’t work. Opened up blades made sure it was clean and installed. Still didn’t work. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap but works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couch from Ashley furnitue 2 years ago. Like many of the other reviews the fabric is pilling (nasty black little balls of materal that looks dirty) Received this today. Doesn't look like much and the power coard is very cheaply made. I had a ton of things to get done but thought let me just give this a try. Well once I started I had to finish. The couch and throw pillows look about 90% better!! I am very pleased! I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: amy jones

customer_reviews.title: Not one problem! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great! No problem over heating and I used it for over 5 -10 minutes at a time! Love the long cord. Great size. Never had a problem with it causing holes like some have said. Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Deanne Jones

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap. It works. It's worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I opted to buy the corded version because I don't want to deal with the uncertainty of a diminished battery charge causing the blade to slow and snag on fabric. The cord's short length doesn't bother me and is a worthwhile trade off for consistent power (I make it sound like I run this thing for hours on end, which I obviously don't). The lint contaner is shallow and requires frequent emptying but it's not a big deal to me. The bottom line is that it's effective at safely removing fuzz from my threads (slang for clothes).
customer_reviews.author: tylerzero

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that likes to claw the side of the couch. This shaves off the little balls it makes. Also works well on sweaters. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: king

customer_reviews.title: Better than the battery version!
customer_reviews.text: I've switched over to the corded version and never looked back. It ensures continuous and constant power delivery for uninterrupted use. Unlike the battery version where power fluctuates as it drains and I've noticed it's not as strong as its corded counterpart.
customer_reviews.author: Hey It's Joel

customer_reviews.title: good item
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item to have and use. My old ones was always battery operated, it is really nice to have an electric fuzz shaver.
customer_reviews.author: ADeborahmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ELECTRIC LINT SHAVER
customer_reviews.text: DAUGHTER USES ON VARIOUS CLOTHING AND LOVES IT - VERY EFFECTIVE IN REMOVING FUZZ BALLS FROM SWEATERS AND OTHER CLOTHING.
customer_reviews.author: SueThomas

customer_reviews.title: In the past i had battery operated shavers and was always disappointed. It works great
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what i wanted and have always wished a sweater shaver would be. In the past i had battery operated shavers and was always disappointed. It works great. In fact i have to empty the shavings more often than i expected bc it works so darn good.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: This is durable and works great
customer_reviews.text: I have revived lots of old clothes with this great de-piller. My lululemon leggings look new again !
customer_reviews.author: Jen555

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Nice little product. Has a good hours worth of use, working like new
customer_reviews.author: R. Pepe

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used this lint shaver for the first time today. It ressurected 2 items of clothing that I thought were ruined. I love that it is electric. I had battery operated ones before and they stop working well when the batteries get weak. Now I no longer have to worry.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R

customer_reviews.title: 1 Star
customer_reviews.text: It was working wonderfully, but I only 1/2 a scarf done before it stopped working. I need to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndy

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I love this thing. I had a black vest and I made the mistake of wearing it with a loose fleece top. The fuzz from it bonded to my black vest. One use of this shaver and it is as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: 3Ob1v7

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and noisy
customer_reviews.text: So noisy!!!! It sounds like it's going to break apart if overworked. I'm not sure how long it's going to last since it seems to be rather flimsy. On the plus side, it fits nicely in my hand and I love the long cord. Would I buy it again? No, I'd try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item did not work
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work at all! We didn’t return it because item was no longer available for return. Bad product did not work, brand new item straight from the box. Very disappointed will never buy products from this brand!
customer_reviews.author: gnautical

customer_reviews.title: It broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! It broke on the first use. Didnt have potency at all. Not worth a penny.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Nice device,  funky power plug
customer_reviews.text: Good device. Works very well. Can't ask for more. Only thing is that funky power plug. Never seen anything like it and feels a bit small for the power socket. But probably stayed in place. I used an extension cord and kept it close to me to make sure I don't tug on it.
customer_reviews.author: Abe A.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as a clothes shaver!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't remove the pills on material. Therefore, it does not work. Definitely don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Showalter

customer_reviews.title: Faulty after a couple years use.
customer_reviews.text: It works for a little while but quits intermittently. Worked good when it did work. The cord seems to be messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie N.

customer_reviews.title: Recvd product and it doesn't work - Amazon says not returnable -
customer_reviews.text: I’d give this a 0 if possible! I just received this and it does not work. The motor is not powering the rotations. Amazon is saying it is not returnable. I don't see anywhere on Amazon's site that says it is not returnable or how to return it. A defective product should be returnable. How do i return it?
customer_reviews.author: K. Droz

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: So thankful I ordered this! I used it on fairly new furniture. Was disappointed that the upholstery was pilling so badly; I spoke to furniture co. They said to use a shaver on it. I bought this based on reviews and price. Couldn't be more pleased with the outcome of the chair. Feels like it did when I purchased it, new!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Defective and cheap, not returnable! Buy something else!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could leave zero stars. Opened it, plugged it in and the blades barely twitch while it’s on. Of course the one item I order that isn’t returnable is broken. Feels light and cheap and really disappointed I won’t get to shave the fabric pills on my furniture. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: xx

customer_reviews.title: This is a great sweater shaver
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sweater shaver! I love that it is corded. My previous one was battery powered and although it worked fine, it seemed like every time I went to use it the batteries were dead. This one also seems more powerful. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Clay

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: used to removed cat scratching marks from couch, worked great
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job. In the past I have had battery ...
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job. In the past I have had battery operated lint shavers and I prefer this corded version. The size is good and the cord is long.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Best sweater shaver!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this. Works even better than I expected. I use it on my furniture as well as clothing. My furniture is upholstered with a fabric that contains nylon and it likes to pill. This sweater shaver quickly made it look like brand new.
customer_reviews.author: lazy cook

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough
customer_reviews.text: I used the tool to remove lint/fuzz on child's white socks. It cleaned them up enough to make the socks wearable a few more times.
customer_reviews.author: A. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: ... a little skeptical at first but this shaver is awesome it works exceptionally well it's powerful consistent I wish ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first but this shaver is awesome it works exceptionally well it's powerful consistent I wish I would've bought one of these along time ago The long cord is definitely a plus
customer_reviews.author: C. Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this bought two one for a Christmas gift one for my self
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: Its really awesome I renewed so many clothes by removing the lint. Its a must have machine.
customer_reviews.author: faiza

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Really has made my sweaters look new again. I also used it on some sheets that had gotten balling. Works like a charm. I love that you can plug it in so I am not going through batteries and it keeps an even power. Great little tool!
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lovers

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is wired, doesn't eat batteries. Works great. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: daaaana

customer_reviews.title: Not using batteries is a big plus.
customer_reviews.text: It gives a close shave and it plugs in. I didn't want to mess with batteries for something I only use 2 or 3 times a year.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Awful. Shreds socks.
customer_reviews.text: This shaver tears my cotton socks apart instead of shaving the pillings off. Too much power. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jamazonian

customer_reviews.title: The company was fantastic about sending a free replacement quickly
customer_reviews.text: Meh...it's ok. The first one I had broke on the first use. The company was fantastic about sending a free replacement quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Lee

customer_reviews.title: Saved my cat ruined couch
customer_reviews.text: Only had the sweater shaver for one day but I used it to clean the couch my cat ruined, and it worked! 12 bucks! I think it's worth it. Every time I would ask or google how to fix cat pulls there were no answers. This think worked great. It took patience but looks much better.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Fixed mom's sweater
customer_reviews.text: This fabric shaver is amazing. I've had battery-operated before and they were good. My husband has a sweater that his mother made about 35 years ago that looked horrible. I've use the new shaver on it and it looks brand-new.
customer_reviews.author: Dmonster

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and so easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing was worried about damaging the fabric on this chair I bought at a yard sale and the Anwenk lint remover did as promised.It looks brand new again.look at the before and after picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Have used it for a few years now and it’s still working great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joana Zucolotto

customer_reviews.title: Great product. 2 things we liked over the older ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. 2 things we liked over the older types. First, the shaving surface is much bigger. Second, it is not battery-operated. It has to be plugged in so you are always good-to-go. You don't have hunt down batteries!
customer_reviews.author: PabbaDabba

customer_reviews.title: Great item to shave your sofa 😊
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item with the hope of bringing my living room set to life again. However, I was impressed with the results as it has successfully exceeded my expectations. Great item to have and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Fawaz

customer_reviews.title: Did a good just stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Shaver worked on my bed sheet did a good job and stop workin. I cleaned it out and it wouldn't work again! How can I get in touch with the seller so I can return it or get one that will work?
customer_reviews.author: Annette Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, and thorough!!! Took off the ...
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, and thorough!!! Took off the fuzzy balls and the fuzz on the sweater that would over time become fuzzy balls :)
customer_reviews.author: A. Bynum

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, looks used , doesn’t remove lint
customer_reviews.text: I just received this in the mail and it looks used. All scratched up everywhere. Could be because it’s cheaply made. I tried it on my cardigan, passed over a small patch 4 times and it barely picked up any lint. I’m going on to pass over a blanket If it struggles to pick up lint I am returning for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Cellardoors

customer_reviews.title: Gift for mom
customer_reviews.text: My mom uses it on a as-needed basis. Works pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Moki

customer_reviews.title: Love the Cord
customer_reviews.text: Works much better than battery operated sweater shavers that I use. The cord is extra long. Plus, being corded, I no longer have to worry about finding batteries or disposing them.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet-Rain

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful and fast.
customer_reviews.text: Much more powerful and much faster than battery powered lint shavers. Works perfectly. No complaints so far. Best lint shaver I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Pays for Itself!
customer_reviews.text: Shaver is easy to use and works pretty well. Cord is 9 feet long for easy access to large items. Electric is better than battery because it doesn't run out of energy. I was able to completely remove balls of lint from some clothing items. Now they are restored and look good again! The shaver pays for itself many times over!
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: love this, the large size is perfect for shaving large areas. also never having to replace batteries is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: When them cotton balls get rotten...
customer_reviews.text: This shaver works well. I use it to remove material balls from clothes, mattress, etc... And no batteries are needed. The down side is it is built with cheap material but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: ZaBigD

customer_reviews.title: Tim the Toolman would love the "more power"!
customer_reviews.text: Electric! Yes! More power and no battery drain. Could redesign the trap to hold more and remove eadier, but hsppy I have it.
customer_reviews.author: RM

product_meta.title: Anwenk Electric Sweater Shaver Lint Shaver Lint Remover USB Corded Sweater Defuzzer Fabric Clothes Shaver/Puller/Remover, Battery Free, for Sweater Knitwear Carpet Blankets Couch Furniture
feature_bullets: Breathe New Life into Old Clothes- Restores your clothes and fabrics to a fresh new look! Perfect Gift for Clothes Pilling Defuzzer. USB Corded, Super long length extended to 92 inches! It makes it even more convenient to use on sweater knitwear carpet blankets alike. (NOTE: USB Adapter Required).

Battery Free - No More Batteries Wasted! Unlike battery operated cloth shavers which fail to continuously bring strong power, this USB corded sweater shaver brings stable and constant strong power to remove lint and balls. 3 powerful stainless steel shaving blades.It safely and efficiently removes fuzz, pills, and lint from sweater, blankets, curtains, carpets, furniture couch and more, without worrying about lower power.
Quick & Easy to Use - Switch to turn it on and gently run the shaving head over the surface of the clothes. Large shaving head makes the job done quickly.

Smart Design- With large shaving head, Detachable larger lint catcher and Comfort grip handle.Carefully slides downward to release the lint catcher. Note: It might be a little firm to release the lint catcher at the first time, but gets easier the next time.

US Standard- Powered by an AC adapter (USB Adapter Not Included,Please use your phone usb adapter). NOTE:This shaver does Not work on thin garments and certain types of clothing fabrics like jeans,silk,lace,embroidered clothing. Do Not run the shaver head on clothing decorations.
